Translations.Text: waayatun lahum anna hamalna dhurriyyatahum fi l-ful'ki l-mashhuni
wakhalaqna lahum min mith'lihi ma yarkabuna
wa-in nasha nugh'riq'hum fala sarikha lahum wala hum yunqadhuna
illa rahmatan minna wamataʿan ila hinin
wa-idha qila lahumu ittaqu ma bayna aydikum wama khalfakum laʿallakum tur'hamuna
wama tatihim min ayatin min ayati rabbihim illa kanu ʿanha muʿ'ridina
wa-idha qila lahum anfiqu mimma razaqakumu l-lahu qala alladhina kafaru lilladhina amanu anut'ʿimu man law yashau l-lahu atʿamahu in antum illa fi dalalin mubinin
wayaquluna mata hadha l-waʿdu in kuntum sadiqina
ma yanzuruna illa sayhatan wahidatan takhudhuhum wahum yakhissimuna
fala yastatiʿuna tawsiyatan wala ila ahlihim yarjiʿuna
wanufikha fi l-suri fa-idha hum mina l-ajdathi ila rabbihim yansiluna
qalu yawaylana man baʿathana min marqadina hadha ma waʿada l-rahmanu wasadaqa l-mur'saluna
in kanat illa sayhatan wahidatan fa-idha hum jamiʿun ladayna muh'daruna
fal-yawma la tuz'lamu nafsun shayan wala tuj'zawna illa ma kuntum taʿmaluna
